text: This game was originally released in Japan as Super Rescue Solbrain and featured different characters based on the TV show, but the most notable difference was Area C which is a Carnival level while in Shatterhand it's a Submarine. The music is also different but both are very solid. A platforming gem for the NES.
author: SupraDarky

text: Jaleco? Gosh I'm thinking on Rival Turf! By the way Supradarky you had to listen the stage 4 track from Rival Turf, best track in the game.
